final_prompt: Subject Description: An opulent, traditional Indian gold-plated necklace with intricate filigree craftsmanship, precise bead patterns, and dangling elements, identical to reference image. Action/Movement: Slow majestic orbit around the necklace with steady cinematic push-in and subtle rotation, culminating in a close-up of the central motif and a gentle profile reveal. Environment/Context: Luxurious royal Indian palace setting with warm golden tones, soft sunlight filtering through windows, emphasizing heritage, cultural pride, and feminine grace. Lighting Mood: Warm, diffused, golden-hour-inspired lighting with soft highlights; a focused spotlight subtly emphasizing the elaborate craftsmanship and reflective surfaces of the gold plating. Camera Tech: 8k resolution, photorealistic masterpiece, macro 100mm f/2.8 lens, shaders with subsurface scattering, highly detailed textures, soft shallow depth of field, soft bokeh for background separation, avoiding any product shape deviations. Style/Aesthetic: Regal opulence with natural warmth, emphasizing craftsmanship, rich gold hues, soft ambient light, and luxurious palace surroundings, evoking elegance and heritage. Critical Constraints: The product appearance remains exactly identical to the reference image; no morphing, shape alteration, or design modification; consistent, realistic sparkle on reflective surfaces, avoiding overexposure or artificial glow; environment supports heritage and tradition, maintaining warm tones, natural light; no distortion, blurry focus, or low resolution; product integrity locked to reference. Negative Prompt: No product morphing, shifting geometry, melting, cartoonish elements, low resolution, blurry images, distorted text or focus breathing, extra stones, changing colors, overexposure, blown highlights, artificial blur, flickering, or misrepresentation of the jewellery's exact shape and size.
rationale: This prompt structure prioritizes the jewellery as the hero, ensuring accurate product depiction with precise technical and stylistic parameters. By following the Golden Formula, it combines detailed craftsmanship, luxurious environment, and controlled lighting to enhance the heritage narrative without risking product misrepresentation or quality issues. The explicit mention of product identity and constraints directly addresses previous feedback, ensuring visual consistency and suitability for a high-end commercial. The technical details guarantee photorealism while maintaining realism and avoiding artifacts, creating a compelling, elegant video aligned strictly with the client's heritage theme.
negative_prompt: Product morphing, shifting geometry, melting, cartoonish, low resolution, blurry, distorted text, anatomical errors, shaky camera, extra stones, changing colors, overexposed highlights, blown highlights, artificial blur, flickering, misrepresentation of product shape or size.
